post:
Hello!

**Dedica.ca** offers high performance Xen VDS. 

Please use this discount code “**hidden_promo_for_lowend**” to get life time  discount or use this discount code **new30** to get one time **-30% discount** for a first payment

**VDS Features:**

- Xen Virtualization
- SolusVM Control Panel
- 24/7 monitoring
- No overselling
- Fast Network
- Port 100mbps

**Unmanaged Xen-1000 Fr**

- 1x CPU Core
- 20GB SSD
- 1024MB RAM
- 10TB bandwidth
- Unmanaged

**$6.99/mo** (with life time discount)   
**$5.47/mo** (with one time discount)  
http://my.dedica.ca/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=24  

**Server location:** France, Canada (on request)
